reviewText: The movie is 5 stars, one of the best I've ever seen. However, for some reason there are no subtitles at all in any language on the DVD. This is only in French. Also note the disclaimer - this is a region specific DVD and ships from France. It will not play on North America devices. You've been warned.  Such a shame, the movie is not available on Netflix, Amazon Prime for streaming or any other I've been able to find. I watched this on a flight from Canada back to the states, its mesmerizing.
